text: RJ Vigneshkanth is an Indian radio jockey and actor. He started his career as a radio jockey during his final year of college, after that he and his friends started a YouTube channel called Smile Web Radio. After the channel gained popularity, the name was changed to Smile Settai. The updated version of Smile Settai was titled Black Sheep. He currently owns three YouTube channels; Unakkennapaa, Smile Settai and Black Sheep.
